catalog_info.title: Conceptual Development: Undergraduate Laboratory Course
catalog_info.notes: Open to undergraduates seeking research experience, especially in preparation for undergraduate theses. Open to undergraduates seeking research experience, especially in preparation for undergraduate theses.
catalog_info.description: Students participate in research on conceptual development and language acquisition. Each student has responsibility for a project. Weekly lab meeting to discuss student projects and readings relevant to them. Ten hours a week commitment (includes lab meeting).
